parameters.name: AscensorName
parameters.description: The ascensor name (use for class & selector)

parameters.name: AscensorFloorName
parameters.description: Choose and name for each floor (ex: 'content1 | content2 | content3')

parameters.name: ChildType
parameters.description: Specify the child tag if no div ('section' or 'article')

parameters.name: WindowsOn
parameters.description: Choose the floor to start on

parameters.name: AscensorMap
parameters.description: If you choose chocolate for direction, speficy position for x/y (ex: '2|1 & 2|2 & 3|2')

parameters.name: Overflow
parameters.description: Choose your main container overflow default behavior

parameters.name: KeyNavigation
parameters.description: choose if you want direction key support

parameters.name: Queued
parameters.description: choose if you want direction scroll queued

parameters.name: QueuedDirection
parameters.description: choose if you want direction scroll queued 'x' or 'y'

parameters.name: Loop
parameters.description: specify if you want an loop
